badges.name: Community Manager
badges.description: This badge is granted to qualified community managers that meet the standards of the Sapien Nation.

badges.name: Conversation Host
badges.description: An exclusive NFT badge granted to the most active users on the Airtime app. Unlocks ability to create new rooms and manage conversations.

badges.name: Event Host
badges.description: Limited edition badge by the Bored Ape Yacht Club that lets access events hosted by the community.

badges.name: Debate Moderator
badges.description: Issued to certified debate moderators on behalf of DebateDAO. Moderators have shown to facilitate productive and fair conversation over debatable topics.

badges.name: Certified Investor
badges.description: Badge granted to all investors across all the investment clubs on the SyndicateDAO protocol.
